duck: Fuse (electrical), a device used in electrical systems to protect against excessive current
Fuse (explosives), a burning device for communicating fire to fireworks, antique gunpowder munitions, or blasting caps
Fuze, a device for exploding military munitions such as bombs, shells, and mines
fuse definition: to reduce to a liquid or plastic state by heat.
Fuse (hydraulic), a device used in hydraulic systems to protect against sudden loss of fluid pressure

milestones: Ohio man dies after sitting in chair for two years
Controversy-plagued Element 118, the heaviest atom yet, finally discovered
Australian DFAT director knew of trucking company involved in alleged Iraqi kickbacks
Ancestors of humans learned to walk in trees, study says
